title: P22 proudly releases Kelly Pro
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204114231/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 17.Mar.2009 2.24pm 

For Immediate Release  
Buffalo, NY- March 17th, 2009

P22 proudly announces Kelly Pro by Ted Staunton

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204114231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KellyFlag_5349.gif)

P22 Kelly Pro is a Celtic-styled uncial font with a medieval gothic flavor  
and an overall contemporary feel. The font is an addition to the Sherwood  
Collection of historical and period-based fonts by Ted Staunton. It is  
ideal for uses that need to evoke the Celtic spirit or the medieval period.

The font is available in pro and basic OpenType styles. Kelly Pro combines  
the two basic OpenType styles, Regular and Alt Caps, into one font and adds  
Pro OpenType features such as swashes, additional titling caps and Central  
European character sets. The Regular and Alt Caps styles are each available  
separately. The two fonts share the same lower case with stylistically  
different upper case designs.

Introductory offer through March 31st.

[http://www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/kelly.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204114231/http:/www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/kelly.html "http://www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/kelly.html")
author: Miss Tiffany
